short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easiest way to create instructional content for software products

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Record a screencast of your software workflow, and have Knowmatic generate a corresponding help center-style article, complete with gifs.

Example output article: https://www.knowmatic.app/how-to

Please note that Knowmatic is currently in private beta. Email hello@knowmatic.app for access credentials!
